title: US DOGE service agreement with Department of Labor shows $1.3 Million fee—and details its mission
summary: A leaked agreement shows the Department of Labor will pay Elon Musk and his operatives $1.3 million for tech services, despite Musk's claims that DOGE would cost taxpayers nothing
